AltName.entry: KING EDWARDS VII SCHOOL SWIMMING POOL TRUST

Desc.entry: Sessions include: adult lane swimming, aquaerobics, adult fitness, fun sessions, parent, baby and toddler, junior squads, private hire and party bookings, junior and adult lessons, over 50s, general public swim sessions. Company limited by guarantee no 2763474.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Thurs 7.15am-9.30pm, Fri 7.15am-8.30pm, Sat 9am-5.30pm, Sun 9am-3pm (opening times), please contact for details and times of individual sessions
